dialogues.speaker: Narrator
dialogues.text: In a world where magic has disappeared, one young apprentice named Eira sets out on a journey to rediscover the lost art.

dialogues.speaker: Eira
dialogues.text: I've heard rumors of a hidden library deep within the forest, where ancient tomes hold the secrets of magic. I must find it before it's too late!

dialogues.speaker: Arin
dialogues.text: Eira, be careful! The forest is treacherous, and dark creatures lurk in every shadow. Are you sure you're ready for this?

dialogues.speaker: Eira
dialogues.text: I was born ready, Arin! Besides, I have a feeling that the fate of our world depends on it.
